input_text: LU Factuality: The purpose of the Covenant:
LU Factuality: There are two types of covenants:
LU Factuality: the religious lawful duty, and the permissible.
LU Factuality: The religious lawful duty, such as al-Jihad and the obedience to higher authorities, is every Muslim's duty by religious law.
LU Factuality: In such a case, allegiance means enforcing the religious lawful duty.
LU Factuality: Even without allegiance, it is still a lawful religious duty.
LU Factuality: While in the case of permissible matters, allegiance makes them religious lawful duties.

LU Factuality: U.S. Congressman Arrives in Iraq for Landmark Visit BAGHDAD, April 16 (Xinhua) --
LU Factuality: U.S. Congressman Tony Hall arrived here Sunday evening, becoming the first U.S. lawmaker to visit Iraq since the 1991 Gulf War.
LU Factuality: Hall, heading a three-member delegation, arrived here at 19:17 (1517 GMT) by land from Jordanian capital Amman, and stayed at the five-star Mansour Hotel.

LU Factuality: At the entrance of the Mansour Hotel, Hall made a brief statement, saying that he came to Iraq because he has heard for a long time about the humanitarian situation here, especially the malnutrition among the Iraqi children and the increasing mortality rate of the children and the elderly.

input_text: LU Factuality: He also said that his visit will mainly focus on the humanitarian situation of Iraq, which has been under crippling U.N. sanctions since its 1990 invasion of Kuwait, the primacord of the 1991 Gulf War.
